name: Razorback White
description:
DMC's Razorback pants are made to be worn. Built from industrial quality material, they feature reinforced kneepads to prevent tears on the job and stay rugged yet comfortable.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
丹宁牛仔的剃刀鲸裤子为穿着而生.采用工业级优质材料制成,加强型护膝可防止工作时撕裂,并保持结实舒适.
女款目前缺货.
